class.name: GFPair
class.brief_description: A reference to a pair of entity IDs.

method.name: first
method.description: Returns the first part of this pair as an entity.

method.name: first_id
method.description: Returns the first part of this pair as an ID.

method.name: from
method.description: Returns a pair from two entity parts.

method.name: from_id
method.description: Returns a pair from a pair ID.

method.name: from_ids
method.description: Returns a pair from two ID parts.

method.name: new
method.description: Do not call, pairs can not be instantiated. Use [method GFPair.from] instead. Overrides [method GFEntity.spawn].

method.name: second
method.description: Returns the second part of this pair as an entity.

method.name: second_id
method.description: Returns the second part of this pair as an ID.
